Create Features API

Adds one or more features to the dataset.

Required Parameters: (none)

Optional Parameters:

Creating a feature in GeoIQ depends on the format, or schema, of the dataset. The Features include any of the optional attributes that are in the dataset and additionally a Geometry that is formatted as GeoJSON.

Parameter Description Example
any attribute any attribute value from the dataset schema {title: “My new Feature”}
geometry GeoJSON formatted geometry {geometry: {type: “Point”, coordinates: [-100, 80.3]}}

Note that any attributes specified in the feature that are not defined for the dataset are ignored.

Example:

Assuming you created an empty dataset as described under Create an empty dataset with JSON and given a JSON array of features in a file features.json:

[{"House Price": 550000, Address: "123 4th St, Arlington, VA 22201", geometry: {type: "Point", coordinates: [-100, 80]}},
  {"House Price": 850000, Address: "2200 Clarendon Blvd, Arlington, VA 22201", geometry: {type: "Point", coordinates: [-120, 62.4]}}]

You could then POST this to the endpoint:

curl -X POST -u "user:pass" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d @features.json http://geocommons.com/datasets/98696/features.json

Adds one or more features to the dataset.

Required Parameters: (none)

Optional Parameters:
